faqTitle: What is the USP or benefits of enrolling to the courses?
faqDesc: C-DAC's industry skilling courses are designed, developed and mentored by R&D experts who have vast experience in implementing real time projects. These courses give an insight into end-to-end project life cycle as per industry standards and processes.

faqTitle: Who are eligible for enrolling to the courses?
faqDesc: Anyone interested can enroll to the courses. Candidates from Electronics, Electrical, Instrumentation, Computer Science, Information Technology or from any equivalent discipline can enroll.

faqTitle: Do I need to read anything before I attend the course?
faqDesc: Yes. All enrolled users are expected to go through an essential module provided as part of the course.
